amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 119-399 to modify section 105 to clarify that the subsection may not be construed to authorize expenditures for additional full-time equivalent employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Self amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Self amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
